description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

descriptionHTML:
Picture yourself on a giant stage, singing in front of thousands of fans screaming your name!
Live your dreams and become a mega music idol… with Coco and her band! Dress like a star, live like a star, rock like a star! Put on a huge show in front of your fans and see how the judges score your performance!

Part of being a superstar is showing off your unique star style! Choose from over 200 of the coolest outfits and accessories to dress up Coco! You can even choose Coco's hair color, hair style and skin tone! Head to the spa, apply professional makeup, and show off your new rock star, music idol look!

Features:
√ Stay up-to-date with your rock star schedule via in-game text messages!
√ Put on a show with Coco in front of all your fans!
√ Perform for the judges and await your scores!
√ Style Coco for the big rock show! You really are a music idol!
√ Choose from the most glamorous dresses, outfits and accessories!
√ Enjoy SPA time! Relax at the Spa before the concert!
√ Smile for the camera The paparazzi can't get enough of you!

- IQ Test completely in English (more languages coming soon)

---------------------------------------------------------------
Why should you take part of this IQ Test?
---------------------------------------------------------------

Influenced by WAIS-IV (Wechsler Intelligence Test for Adults) and research by students of the University of Rostock, the IQ Test includes the following tasks:

- Perceptive reasoning
- Processing speed
- working memory
- speech understanding
- Number understanding

These categories are queried in the IQ Test in various categories, including sample groups, dice test, remember pictures, number series, matrix test, estimate, order numbers and more!

Start your IQ Test now and compare with your friends! The first quiz has around 100 tasks, so take some time and start your IQ Test today!

description: Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items. You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:- Ultimate ocean survival simulator- Life on raft- Dangerous underwater world- Easy learning craft system- Optimized graphics- Realistic visual effectsDive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
descriptionHTML:
Meet the continuation of the game series Survival in the Ocean!
You are person who survived after airplane crash in deep ocean. No one around could help you. On the horizon is not visible land. Around only the ocean and hungry sharks.

But fortunately, the boxes that were left behind after the plane crash are passing by! You have a hook with you! You can collect these boxes - they can have many useful resources and items.

You should watch over your health and at the time of eating. At the top of the screen are indicators of health, satiety and oxygen levels. Take food to replenish your health. You can go fishing and then cook your food at the stake. So you can live longer.

Dive into the water - there are many interesting things! Beware of dangerous hungry sharks. Craft a powerful tool in the workbench to protect yourself from sharks. Collect seaweed on the ocean floor, look for hiding places. From algae you can make a very nutritious soup!

Make your raft as big as you can! Collect different resources. Use them to craft new items. Use the workbench and oven to open new recipes for craft.

Ocean Survival 3D - 2 features:
- Ultimate ocean survival simulator
- Life on raft
- Dangerous underwater world
- Easy learning craft system
- Optimized graphics
- Realistic visual effects

Dive into deep ocean, explore underwater world! It's time to survive with Ocean Survival 3D - 2!
recentChanges: - fixed climb on raft from water
- improved graphics - choose Graphics Quality in the Settings
- new visual effects - realistic water and weather
- you can escape - try to find a way out
summary: You on raft. Survive on raft in ocean. Build, craft, use hook, dive and explore!
title: Ocean Survival 3D - 2

comments: I really like the game...I love all of your games, but I'm a little disappointed with this one. How can you not have any white veils or shoes in a wedding game? Why no black shoes for the groom? And the flower girl looks like a cartoon! You guys need to make some changes but overall I love this game...❤

Made the mistake of buying this. There are no white veils, which is ridiculous. No black or brown hair. No different skintones.  Hairdos are very limited. The flower girl looks weird. And the gameplay itself is frustrating. When you hit the checkmark in a location it just randomly takes you to another area. And if you've already been there you have to do it over again or the game will just assign random stuff. When you hit the checkmark it should just take you back to the map. The setup now is just dumb. Save your money. Wish I could get mine back.

I have only one thing to say . Coco games look wow from outside but worst from inside. When I saw it's graphics I thought this is the best game but when I installed it I saw that there were so less activities and half items were locked . Please unlock these items. My request
I dislike this game Because I downloaded it thinking it's free. And u have to pay In order to do the hair and makeup and decorate the cake. It's a disappoint
Its awesome but... Some people said this is kinda boring but... I'll try it and see it its boring if it is thani guess I'll just you know I'll just delete it :( well I'll go try it :)

This game could be good in so many ways,  but certain things let it down. This game freezes constantly while loading, it also has way too many adverts. Plus it gets boring playing the same female character over and over, put other female characters, or different versions of coco.

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You’re the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids’ breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don’t let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:• High Quality 3D Graphics• Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! • Smooth and Easy Controls• Addictive Game Play• Super Cool House Environment• Family Woman Life Simulation• Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

description: The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious?  ♂️ ♀️We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ♂️ ♀️🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in lifeEmily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

description: Dinosaur World Craft Exploration:Lite - an exciting game in prehistoric cubic universe where you build, construct, create & craft - using blocks - in world! Dinosaurs (t-rex [tyrannosaurus], triceratops etc.] all around you! This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. Build and create amazing & perfect things from the simplest of homes to the grandest constructions! Start the adventure with “Dino Jurassic Craft Exploration”! This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! This pocket edition (exploration) game contains: block placing, cube world, real time world craft generation. Build a dinosaur world!Craft & Explore the cube world! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‘Dino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution’ - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! Go beyond your wildest dreams, make your own cube jurassic world, mine, castle or city! Great game for adults! And teens! Transform the surface in a 3D environment in Jurassic Jungle! Build shelter, fight, grow and use blocky craft. The only limit is your imagination! Start a cube world craft! Create & build in a prehistoric times!2. Beware of dinosaurs! T-Rex is here!3. Plunge into a world full of danger

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

comments: I adore this game. For me, it is perfect and completely flawless. I used to play it when I was young and I have very lovely memories with this game. The reason I gave it 1 star only is that you only play 3 levels other than the tutorials and then you will have to buy it. I know it is my problem that I don't buy games in general but it is so sad that the game's developers are so rude and cruel and money-worshippers.

Used to love this game. The developers have done generally a good job porting it to Android. Sadly, on my device (Galaxy Tab S2), there seems to be a number of bugs with the neighbour getting into a loop from episode 1 of season 2. He goes looping with the parrot and with the bird on the top balcony. Fix these bugs and I'll raise my score. Funny how the bugs start after you have to pay!

Upon loading up the game I was treated to a 40 second advert. After that the menu loaded.   I pressed play and again was treated to another advert. After the level (walking though a door) another advert played.   I get it. The games rubbish. And your trying to get me to play something decent.  Sorry game deleted due to being mainly adverts.

I used to play this game and love it.. But purchasing each level? Reallllly? Greedy developers! i hate it! Don't download this game! It let you play the instructions and 3 episodes then you have to pay for each episode! Waste of time and space really! 1 star is enough for this game..

Before the app fully loaded,  ad.. then you pick the 1st level,  ad. Then you return  the menu after the 20 second first level, ad. Could you make sure I like the app before destroying me with angry birds ads?

Love this game. Used to play it on the PC when it first came out. Few levels free, and a video add before a level but it's worth paying the single payment, which removed the ads and unlocks the game. The second season is amazing also. Wish they made more.

description: It’s JAWS...but with crocodiles!*CHOMP CHOMP CHOMP*	This ravenous crocodile lurks after its frantic prey. With an appetite as big as this beast, you can hunt and snatch up anything. Swim, slither, crawl, and attack! Emerge suddenly from the waters, crawl onto the shore of the beach, and explore around the island looking for your next meal, frightening the unexpecting humans and animals equally. Get them unawares! Control this giant in water and on land. Additionally, change the skin of your crocodile to cool themes including  your country’s flag (if you’re feeling patriotic)!Put your massive jaws to use and cause chaos! description: SubZone - KamchatkaHere is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D. Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates. Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.~ Cyclops GamesIn this new version:* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.* 6 modern submarines you can command* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vesselsPlease rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better ~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea SkirmishNOTES:  BETA VERSION:====================We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic* updates will be frequent while we get everything working* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems MULTIPLAYER:===================* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped  back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
descriptionHTML:
SubZone - Kamchatka

Here is a free, 3D multiplayer submarine battle adventure for your phone or tablet!

Thanks to everyone for your suggestions and requests on how to improve the original Submarine Simulator 3D.

Please keep the suggestions and ideas coming and we will try to include them in the updates.

Do you have a favorite submarine you would like to see in the game? Let us know and we will try to include it.
~ Cyclops Games


In this new version:

* Battle a rogue warlords navy that have set up port in the remote islands off Russia's Kamchatka Peninsula.

* Sink cruisers, destroyers, weapon-carrying cargo tankers, and drug-running fish boats.

* Outwit competing subs in multiplayer mode for salvage and gold bars.

* 6 modern submarines you can command

* Restock your torpedo supply by salvaging them from ships and submarines you sink

* Explore the seafloor for crates of ammo, repair equipment and gold bars

* Use your periscope with and homing torpedoes to blow up enemy vessels

Please rate and review and send us your requests to make this game better

~ Coming soon: SubZone - Red Sea Skirmish

NOTES: BETA VERSION:
====================
We are still perfecting the multiplayer logic
* updates will be frequent while we get everything working
* send us an email and tell us about any bugs or problems

MULTIPLAYER:
===================
* Since WiFi connections on mobile devices are not the best, you may see the game trying to reconnect at times.
* It is important that the player "hosting" the game has a good connection and keeps the game in the foreground
* If the player who is hosting the game does not keep the game in the foreground on the device, they will be bumped back to the main menu, and another player will automatically be assigned as the new host
* The number of subs you have sunk shown in the bottom left is a tally of subs sunk in multiplayer mode
summary: Battle your friends in the ultimate underwater show down.  Download now.
title: Submarine Sim MMO

description: Wow, it looks like you got into unusual dreams about falling humans on a flat floor. It's pretty amusing, but you'll have to find a way to get out of those dreams.Otherwise, you will have to spend eternity in such a dream and fall on a flat floor again and again with other human and beasts. To find a way out, the fall human combined into gangs and arranged a beast tournament in fights without rules to find out which gang is steeper.You will have to fight like an beast with other fall human on a flat floor, so that your gang will become the winner and be able to get out of these strange dreams. Show your wit and use the environment in your favor.Let the laws of physics become your allies in beast fighting without rules between gangs. Let the fall human on the flat floor understand that you can not be stopped and only you and your gang deserve victory.
descriptionHTML:

description: Dog Town is a FREE pet caring simulation game where you can collect dog cards and dogs like: basset hound, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Bull Terrier, Great Dane, Shnauzer, Cocker Spaniel, French Bulldog, Pomeranian, Doberman, Siberian Husky, Miniature Pinscher, Labrador, Beagle, Chihuahua, Corgi, Dachshund and other dog breeds with a large emphasis on Dog Collection and management for casual and midcore players. Players will collect dogs, train them to level them up and send them to quests for exciting in-game rewards! If you always wanted to adopt a pet, play with puppies was interested in pet rescue this is one of the best pet games for you. With the ability to customize the rooms where their dogs will live we've put tremendous amount of effort to ensure that players would feel attached to their dogs just like they would to the real ones.In coming updates we will bring more dog cards for cute puppies and dogs to groom and breed like Dachshund, Corgi , Chihuahua, Labrador, Beagle, Miniature Pinscher, Siberian Husky, Doberman, Pomeranian, French Bulldog, Cocker Spaniel, Shnauzer, Great Dane, Bull Terrier, Yorkshire Terrier, Australian Shepherd, Labrador Retriever, Boston Terrier, Springer Spaniel, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, basset hound and many others puppies! Each dog will have a unique character and behavior, so players will always recognize their "Sleepy" from the "Jumpy"! And what's better is that the game is in full 3D and a planned VR support coming in future updates will ensure that the immersion to the Dog Town is always at high levels!Start collecting your dogs now and show your own collection to the world!FEATURES★ Gorgeous 3D environment! ★ Realistic Dogs with lifelike behavior! ★ Breed and groom your own Dog Collection!★ Level up your dogs and send them to quests!★ Decorate your rooms with hundreds of decorations!★ More than 60 dogs to collect and more to come!PLEASE NOTE!This game is still in early development.And a network connection is required.UPCOMING FEATURES● Interaction with the dogs● Translation (German, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese and few more)● More dogs and decorations● Backyard / Minigames ● Dog dressup and competition with friendsUpcoming dog breeds: basset hound, Dachshund, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, Chihuahua, Corgi, Labrador, Beagle, Springer Spaniel, Miniature Pinscher, Boston Terrier, Labrador Retriever, Siberian Husky, Australian Shepherd, Yorkshire Terrier, Doberman,  Bull Terrier, Pomeranian,  Great Dane, Shnauzer, French Bulldog,  Cocker Spaniel and other dogs.Best dog simulation and pet rescue game ever!If you are having any problems in the game or have a great idea about it please contact gamesupport@frismos.com

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!! Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car. 2. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  3. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.4. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive. To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.    ***Game features:*** - Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Different missions for different cars. - Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models with skins.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Fun quest- and arcade-style missions.   Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games
descriptionHTML:
You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.
You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.
Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!

Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your car.
2. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
3. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
4. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen. The side areas with the control buttons are inactive.
To successfully activate the interactive parts of the game, you must first drag the component of interest to the center of the screen while in 360-degree mode. Press to confirm your selection.

comments: Bowls bowling 3D It's a terrific game, fun and skill in deed! One recommendation; have more head to head without having to bet any coins. Betting for some reason slows the game and puts the players in a defensive position when ranked in a lessor tier. It's fun just to play and find people who also just want to have fun without that betting pressure. Make it more friendly, so the players can compete w each other not only to win coins! Please!

1 star as the game stands at the moment. There is an exploitable cheat mode where a player can make the opening shot very short  against a nearby part of the pier. Once that is done the second player cannot make a shot.  This is used far too often by cheating players.  Sort this and the game is playable.

A play mode which would follow  miniature  golf  a little  with small  elevation changes , off camber spots , obstacles  jump water , ramp threw tire. Different  playing fields like open parks with bench seats and walking stones for Hazzard.  The pier is cool to play on ,put some open knot holes on it for Hazzard. Multiple  modes to choose  from. The strait up mode is nice ...  but could  be better.  I like world league  it's a blast  and I'm doing very well in it. I gave you a 4star  app plays smooth  and the game itself  is fun. I'll be waiting for the upgrades.

TONY Revised from 2 stars to 4 stars as this as said before is an excellent game would have been 5 stars if it was not for the fact the top 10 or so players have a way to cheat without playing a game. So annoying and unfair. I suggest blanket the top 20 or so players to the same prize or find a way to stop them. Cheers for a great game though

Marc This game has made a big improvement since I last uninstalled. The is however a major glitch. When the Jack goes in the water it is replaced back where it started. This allows the leading player a massive advantage as all they need to do is pin the jack and will never lose an end, if the Jack is shot out please either play a dead end or put the Jack in the middle. More experienced players play the Jack to the side every time because they know they will win the end. Alternatively put a barrier in.

Fairly addictive I've grown to love this game. The gameplay is pretty smooth, with just an occasional hiccup. My one gripe is that it can take a while for the game to find you someone to play! By the way, how do you get into Season 3?

description: Driving forestry machines is fun! Use harvester, logging truck and other machines, supply sawmill with timber. Try driving logging truck and Timber Harvester Simulator for a sawmill in our forestry machines simulator - it’s better than cutting real trees!Features of Timber Harvester Simulator:- Big forest full of timber- Variety of forestry machines- Forest logging missions- Realistic machines control and physics- Open world drivingRealistic machines!You have three types of forestry machines in the simulator - harvester, tow truck and logging truck. All machines have unique roles in forestry. Learn functions and ways of driving main forestry machines in our simulator - harvester, timber truck or tow truck are yours to play with. Every forestry truck type also has driving missions in the Timber Harvester Simulator - cut timber with harvester, deliver it with logging truck and complete other tasks.Forestry job!Driving big forestry machines like Timber Harvester Simulator and logging truck in our simulator is a man’s job! descriptionHTML:
Driving forestry machines is fun! Use harvester, logging truck and other machines, supply sawmill with timber. Try driving logging truck and Timber Harvester Simulator for a sawmill in our forestry machines simulator - it’s better than cutting real trees!

Features of Timber Harvester Simulator:
- Big forest full of timber
- Variety of forestry machines
- Forest logging missions
- Realistic machines control and physics
- Open world driving

Realistic machines!
You have three types of forestry machines in the simulator - harvester, tow truck and logging truck. All machines have unique roles in forestry. Learn functions and ways of driving main forestry machines in our simulator - harvester, timber truck or tow truck are yours to play with. Every forestry truck type also has driving missions in the Timber Harvester Simulator - cut timber with harvester, deliver it with logging truck and complete other tasks.

Forestry job!
Driving big forestry machines like Timber Harvester Simulator and logging truck in our simulator is a man’s job! Get your truck and learn forestry machines driving tutorial in the simulator. Once you learn driving harvester, logging truck and other machines, do timber logging missions. The forest is full of job and timber, get to it!

Big forest!
Driving forestry machines, like logging truck or harvester will take to different locations for timber. Pass offroad locations on your truck to deliver and cut the timber. Don’t get lost while driving between sawmill and harvester sites. Explore different forestry locations in our simulator and do offroad truck delivery!

Harvest all timber in the simulator of Timber Harvester Simulator - a simulator of forestry machines like harvester or timber truck!

description: This is not just a simple dog rac, it is latest and amazing professional dog race simulation with beautiful riding tracks environment. So welcome to the challenging and exciting game which is quite different from other racing games. This extreme wild dog rush competition is going to be held in between multiple dogs. Wild crazy dog race is a real competitive animal racing game. Amazing greyhound racing championship includes multiple rally missions on different tracks which give you a real thrilling experience of animal race. You have to show professional skills to handle the dog’s race. This unique animation game has addictive challenges and exciting missions.Now you are going to enter into the world of dog riding and this game is especially designed to express the riding skills of racing fans. The beautiful realistic environment and breathtaking animal racing scenes will attract you to play this addictive and adventurous game. So you have to run your dog as fast as you can to eliminate the other dogs. You have to win the rush in any case in required time periods otherwise you can loose the mission if opponent eliminates you first. On the other hand after completing the mission you can get score which can help you to unlock new fast and multi races speedy dogs. Feel the thrill & excitement and enjoy the real bulldog race along with multiple levels. So you have to win the race first to unlock next levels. You have to know that which rider chases the destination first will lead to win. This racing game is a combination of multiple and different races dogs. The racing tracks are especially designed for dog rush. Amazing realistic background sound effects, stunning 3D graphics, smooth control and multiple camera angles will help you to control the game with different angles. You can enjoy with this modern racing practice. This dog race both kids and adults can play easily. Features:Attractive and adventurous game playAmazing multiple races dogsMultiple exciting levels Realistic background sound effectsSmooth and easy controlThrilling and multiple challenges Amazing stunning 3d graphicsRealistic running tracks

description: Welcome to Farm Tractor Trolley Cargo Simulator 2018!You have obviously driven four gear cars and trucks on mixed tracks, but this is the time you should try stunning four gear drive on a Farm Tractor with dissimilar wheel size. You should try driving an auto mobile whose wheel size is not same, believe me its significantly difficult. Eight cylinder large beam engine make it even difficult to practice conventional driving skills on a Heavy Tractor. Live the life of village farmer & transport your life's earning to the city market.Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills on this new modified version of cargo transport simulator to check your heavy duty transporter handling skills on mountainous tracks and elevated roadsides. Transporting loaded trolleys with the help of a heavy tractor is not as easy as it looks like. This Heavy tractor cargo transport sim composed of very difficult yet exciting game play options which challenge your cargo transportation skills on various deadly tracks. Transport farming products like wheat, forage grass, pumpkins and other crops.Majority of young generation is not aware of what a tractor is, but it is the foremost component of farming even in this modern era. Farming is incomplete without cargo tractors which help transport farming goods from one place to other. This brand new 3D cargo transporter game will give you the real life experience of driving heavy duty cargo tractors and natural atmosphere which you have never experienced. Transportation of goods from city market to farm cites is not possible without real tractor cargo transport. This needs pro cargo driving skills due to long and bouncy tracks. Challenge your heavy duty tractor driving skills in Tractor Cargo Simulator, grow your farm and become the all time best cargo transport driver of the city.Cultivated crops when harvested are loaded from various farming fields and action villages on Heavy Tractor Trolleys. Forage plough farming also need Heavy Tractor to move to nearby markets after being loaded by the help of little cranes. This latest Tractor trolley Simulator is equipped with charming 3D graphics and a variety of locations and dangerous tracks to drive on while challenging your tractor trolley driving skills. You can enjoy variety of farming modes such as transportation of farming animals from different locations, transporting fertilizers and pesticides to protect your farm from insects attack, or delivering ready feed-stock to the nearby market to earn money. You can also transport wood logs from jungle sites to furniture markets to earn lot of money. Heavy Tractor Trolley Cargo:Rural Farmer Simulator Features:- Realistic cultivated lush green farms ready to be harvested- Go out in the field and load your tractor trolley with wood logs- Drive carefully to deliver farming goods to nearby city market- Manage everything on the ranch- Drive Over the Mountains and steep deadly tracks- Advanced engine physics and easy controls- Transport animals like sheep, goat & cows via truck driving- Loaded Tractor Trolley drive on Risky 3D tracks

comments: Very cute!  It has lots of fun things to do.  I love having the ability to customize my pony.  My main issue with this app is that it doesn't save anything.  I'm tired of some outfits being free one day and locked the next.  Other than that, its fairly good!

Amazing game buuuuut... Sometimes after I exit the fashion show, the game just pauses while loading... Also, another update you guys can make is to make a save button or make the game automatically save our progress because if you exit the game, all of the items you unlocked by watching ads are loaded again and nobody feels like watching the ads again to unlock items they already unlocked. Great game though!🦄🐎

This is a fun and interesting game and it has good illustrations but I have two suggestions. First, save the outfits and makeup when you exit the game because it gets annoying to redo it every time I open the app. Second, make the races longer and more complicated.

I like this game but... Every time I play for about 5 minutes and I try to press something then it won't load. So then I have to press my phone's home button then I start the app all over again. If this was fixed then I would give this app 5 stars. But this always bothers me to get rid of my pony's outfit. This is a fun game overall.

Coco play games used to be really good with barely no ads like Ava the 3d doll. Now, look what happened. This game has stacks of ads that has NO X BUTTON causing me to press ◀ every time they show up.

This is supposed to be a kids game. All u see every 1min even if u dont click anything are violent ads. Ad infested game. Played for 5mins saw 20 violent ads. Deleted on the 6mins. All 4 and 5 star reviews are paid to write reviewers. Read those with 1or2 stars and u get what i mean.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

descriptionHTML:
In a land of snow, snow land far far away lives a queen of ice. The kingdom is in celebration lately because the queen of ice is pregnant with the twin sisters ice baby and is soon to become the ice mommy!! Ice mommy of two twin sisters ice baby princesses.
On the day of the ice mommy twin sisters ice baby coming celebration the ice mommy is meeting all the guests for her celebration, ice mommy is happily meeting all the guests in her snow land kingdom but oh no!! Ice mommy suddenly feels very sick!!

Now what?Ice mommy thinks that the twin sisters ice baby are going to come now!! For that she needs emergency surgery someone must call the doctor at the snow land ice hospital clinic to give ice mommy an emergency baby pregnancy maternity surgery!!
Ice mommy is immediately taken to the hospital clinic for emergency surgery for her twin sisters twin babies ice baby!! So now get ready for emergency surgery operation of ice mommy and her twin babies which are twin sisters ice baby!!

When the ice mommy is at the hospital clinic of the snow land kingdom be the best nurse and gynecologist to give her comfort and relaxing support.
¬ First of all when the ice mommy comes you should take her temperature to see if she’s well or sick then proceed with the emergency surgery baby pregnancy operation.
¬ After that take the blood test of ice mommy.
¬ Giver her injection so she can feel better and has all good nutrients a pregnant ice mommy should have.

¬ After that check her sugar, if it is low then provide her sugar level balance.
¬ After that give her oxygen mask to make her feel relaxed before surgery.
¬ After that proceed with the ultrasound test to assure the safety of the ice mommy twin babies twin sisters ice baby!!
¬ After that cut the stomach of ice mommy for cesarean operation surgery operation.
¬ Then you have to take the twin babies twin sister ice baby out of the mommy stomach and cut the cord to give them baby care.
¬ After newborn twin sisters have been born give them to ice mommy and continue with mommy and baby care!!!

This way you can save both the snow land ice mommy and her twin babies the ice baby twin sisters from any danger!!
Now the ice mommy will go back to her castle to celebrate the childbirth of her new twin babies twin sisters. The kingdom now has new princesses that everyone will love. And the reason why the twin sisters have come into the snow land world is all thanks to you!!
Play more levels of the game to prove that you are the best gynecologist around in the whole of the snow land kingdom!!

*** Feature of the game***
• Pregnancy surgery simulation.
• Multiple characters.
• Ice kingdom snow land celebration simulation
• Surgical instruments simulation
• Fun graphics and sounds
• Engaging for all kids and adults to play

description: Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.List of safety tips:- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator- Stand straight facing the elevator's door- Press the button of the desired level- Keep the elevator neat and clean- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level- Stand still till the door is completely open- Prefer stairs in case of fireLift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. descriptionHTML:
Lift Safety For Kids is a good game to teach your little ones about lifts. In this safety game, you can learn how to use the lift properly will ensure fun for everyone. Here we can add tons safety levels for you, In the first level, you can learn If the elevator is full Be patient and wait for the next ride, Wait till everyone gets off the elevator. At the next level, you can learn about lift buttons and many more learning tips. Next level kids will learn what to do when the lift is stuck and also learn how to exit from the elevator. After that, you can learn what to do in case of fire in the elevator. So visit each and every level in this kids learning game and learn tons safety tips in a fun way. Play and enjoy this Kids Safety game and don't forget to share it with your friends and all the family members.

List of safety tips:

- Unshoulder your bag before entering into the elevator
- Stand straight facing the elevator's door
- Press the button of the desired level
- Keep the elevator neat and clean
- Stand peacefully and wait till your desired level
- Stand still till the door is completely open
- Prefer stairs in case of fire

Lift Safety For Kids is pre toddler and early age educational game. The safety game is designed specifically for kids.

"Love, BTS!" is a role-playing game that allows you to talk and text with members of BTS! You can now talk to all BTS members just a tap away!

- Customizable ringtone
- Customizable themes
- Customizable options, including: dialog speed, personal name, bias selection

descriptionHTML:
Just Freeskiing is a highly authentic ski/freeski simulation with sheer endless possibilities to tweak, style and combine realistic tricks!
The numerous Slopestyle, Halfpipe, Big-Air, Jibbing (Rails, Boxes) and Backcountry challenge locations are covering a huge variety of freeskiing.

The game features a powerful yet simple steering technology with supportive in-game tutorials and simple buttons for beginners and advanced possibilities (2x taps, swipes, etc.) as well as enhancements (Grab-Trick-Packages) for Pro’s.

Summarized, the aim of the game is to beat the world’s best scores and to master given challenges in order to improve your overall skiing skills.

Let’s go and give it a try !!


FEATURES
- Finest freeskiing action sports simulation
- Halfpipe, Slopestyle, Park, Slopes and Backcountry
- „Real Resort“ Level: LAAX, Switzerland
- 5 unique levels with a total of 38 spots
- 4 Customizable male & female characters
- Several skis to choose from
- Challenge, Competition and Training mode
- Beat the World’s Best Scores
- Tilt- or virtual joystick navigation
- Replay option
- English and German language


TRICK POSSIBILITIES
Slope: Ollie, Revert, Powerslide, Powerturn
Slides: 50-50, Slide, Nosepress, Tailpress, Noseslide, Tailslide
Tricks/Grabs: Safety L/R, Nosegrab L/R, Tailgrab L/R, Double-Hand Nosegrab, Double-Hand-Tailgrab, Mute L/R,Octo L/R, Japan L/R, LS Shifty, RS Shifty
Rotations: LS Spins, RS Spins, SW LS Spins, SW RS Spins, Frontflips, Backflips, Rodeos, Misty Flips, Corked Spins


OPTIMIZED
The game graphics are optimized for newer and powerful device. Graphics quality and performance may vary depending on your device.


IN APP PURCHASES
The game offers an In-App purchase for each level to get permanent and unlimited access. To get access to all Trick-Buttons and more Grab-Tricks, there is a Grab-Package In-App purchase within the game.


MORE ACTION SPORTS GAMES
For more Freestyle Ski games, Freeski games and Snowboard games, please visit our website rndrln-games.com


IMPORTANT NOTICE
If you experience any problems with the game or in case you have any questions or comments, please contact us directly - support(at)randerline.com.

Via Sulé 6
CH-7017 Flims Dorf
Switzerland

comments: The game is a lot of fun, very addictive. The only problem I'm having is it seems to close by itself. I'm running it on the Razer Phone so I know I can more than handle this game. No lag, no freezes.. Just random force closure. You should check that out devs. Otherwise, good all round.

I love this game. Every part of it. Even the weird "multiplayer" that's supported by another app... the graphics are incredible, music is intense yet becomes subtle in the background after a bit of playing. It's challenging enough to come back and try again after dying without giving up completely. I have experienced zero bugs or glitches during regular gameplay. You've made the perfect game for me, and I thank you.

This game has little to offer. U just jump over obstacles and thats it. Customizable options are so bad and expensive. Your in the first person prespective so why bother customizing yourself. Theres barely a difference from your default skin to the most expensive skin. But the game is OK i guess. Nothing special

Really cool game. Expect to rage as you move higher up in the loops.  Really wish there was a way to save replays. I love that the devs give you the option to turn ads on and reward you for having them on instead of making you pay to turn them off like other game devs. Keep it up!

In general a pretty good game, but the achievements rarely register. I have a high score of 11, and yet I don’t have the loop 10 achievement. I needed to get past loop 5 about 6 times before it finally gave me the achievement. Other than that though, I liked it.

Two things I've noticed: 1. Haptic is a little laggy; maybe make a section in setting to let users adjust that to their own devices? 2. Graphics are amazing but it seems like the FR is spotty which effects users' game play; maybe add a setting if you haven't already for lower quality options?

description: لعبة تجهيز الصبايا لحلفة الزفاف من أجمل العاب صبايا بنات، عليكي اختيار صبية صبية لتجهيزها لحفلة الزفاف، عليكي أن تضعي المكياج وبعدها عليكي أن تلبسي الصبية أجمل اللباس، لتكون جاهز لليلة الزفاف، في اللعبة يوجد عدد من الصبايا وكل صبية لها عدة مراحل لذلك لن تشعري بالملل من اللعبة.حاولنا في هذه اللعبة تجميع كل العاب حفلات الزفاف في لعبة واحدة، فمثلاً قمنا بتجميع لعبة التجهيز لحفل الزفاف و لعبة التجهيز لحفلة الزفاف 2018، لعبة تجهيز حفل الزفاف و العاب التجهيز لحفل الزفاف و لعبة تجهيز حفل زفاف ولعبة تجهيز حفلة الزفاف و العاب تجهيز حفلة الزفاف والعاب تجهيز حفل الزفاف الهندي ولعبة تجهيز العروس لحفل الزفاف والعاب تجهيز لحفل زفاف، كل هذه الالعاب جمعناها لكم في لعبة واحدة.أيضاً هذه اللعبة سيتم تحديثها أولاً بأول فمثلا اذا نشرت لعبة التجهيز لحفل الزفاف 2019 أو لعبة التجهيز لحفلة الزفاف 2020 سيتم تحديثهم مباشرة على هذه اللعبة، من دون تعب ستحدث اللعبة تلقائية على جوالك. أيضاً كل العاب حفلات الزفاف للعرائس موجودة لدينا، فمثلاً موجود عندنا  لعبة حفلة الزفاف مضحك و لعبة حفل الزفاف لجمع النقود ولعبة حفل الزفاف الازرق لعبة حفل الزفاف الرومانسى و لعبة حفل زفاف و لعبة حفل زفاف الازرق لعبة ديكور حفل الزفاف الرومانسي و لعبة حفل الزفاف تعب قلبي و لعبة حفل الزفاف الملكي و لعبة حفل الزفاف المضحك لعبة حفل زفاف ليلى 2018 لعبة حفل زفاف ليلى 2019 و لعبة حفل زفاف العروسة ليلي 2020 اول ما تنشر ستجدونا حدثناها على الالعاب.والعاب تلبيس بنات، والعاب مكياج بنات الجديدة 2018، ولعبة تلبيس صبايا بنات، والعاب بنات وبس، والعاب ميك اب، والعاب فساتين الزفاف، ولعبة ملابس حفلة ليلية، جميعها ستجدونها في حسابنا.اذا اعجبتكم اللعبة لا تنسو تقييمها خمسة نجوم . وشكراً

comments: Adorable so far, I'm so happy to see another game come out! I really like P:ure, they're so sweet and the graphics are awesome as always. Still difficult to get coins though. The  gonna take me forever to get the good ending, haha. Other than that I'm still looking forward to finishing! ❤

I really like this game but, not going to lie, I had to do a lot of the 'free charging' quests to get coins so I could pass the competition with Stacey(3). It worked in the end, I've completed Greg, Simon, and P:ure's stories (I think my favorites are definitely P:ure and Greg). The only thing I don't like is having to skip through every time... but it's better than having to go through the story each time. Graphics are beautiful though and I'm considering cosplaying Greg or P:ure.

Really enjoying the game and the art. I was especially surprised by the emotional ending I received. I wasn't expecting so much depth. I would have given five stars, but as others have mentioned, there are issues with the free charge not paying out and the translations could use some more work, but the game is great regardless.

I love the characters. P:ure is so cute and Simon is precious. But Tay is extremely unlikable and Stacey is over the top rude. Like, she's annoying and ruins the game. Also, I can't get past chapter 14. It says I need to raise my value even though it states that it's not necessary.
I LUV THIS GAME!!  The thing is that I do everything to get some more cores but it won't work ㅠㅠ I'm really annoyed I tried so many times but it won't work! So it forces u to pay...

Ahhh!! I loved this game!! I just finished the ending with P:ure and I'm emotional right now it was so unpredictable I didn't know that would happen... P:ure will forever hold a place in my little black heart

comments: Good game, not so good port. Tiny text, touch not registering, unable to tap in game buttons.  Edit: much better control after the update. Please allow premium purchase to have higher reward like the steam/ ois version.  Nb: any way to sync to multiple devices?
The game looks great, it sounds great. but even though I'm all for tactical combat, I found this game to be way too slow.
Good stuff

The dice seem unbalanced. There have been to many times I have flanked a character and played a card to get dice to only miss them all and take damage. I have only played against some higher teir characters but it seems like there rolls come out better. If roll percentages are connected to your characters teir that is complete BS.   Other then that great game, love the theme, feel and music. Great job on the tutorial short, clean, straight to the point. Thank you for not explaining what a dice is or telling me I can tap my phone.

The major problem here is availability. I am constantly trying to open this game to no avail. When it does connect to the servers, this game is fantastic. I have a limited playing window, and if the game won't let me play it's not much of a game.  Connecting to servers: check Acquiring rooms data: spinny white glyph  That's the entire game. The end.

The game by itself is FANTASTIC, but the performance issues are such a pain! Truly I cannot understand why a 300- MB app has so many slowdowns and crashes, WHILE SOME DAYS AGO, THINGS WERE WAY BETTER. This issue was supposed to be the main focus of the last update.
description: ★★★★★  5/5 – Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com★★★★☆  4/5 – Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.comWarbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game online arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as “Warring States period”. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ 5/5 – Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com
★★★★☆ 4/5 – Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.com

Warbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game online arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.

Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.

Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as “Warring States period”. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
recentChanges: - Application loading process optimized and shortened
summary: Turn-based historical hex CCG wargame, with samurai and ninja skirmish fights.
title: Warbands: Bushido - Tactical Miniatures Board Game

descriptionHTML:
You’re so lucky! You’re part of a super cool girl squad! Go on a shopping spree with your BFF’s, and get the trendiest clothes! Get a new look and walk the runway with your friends at the awesome fashion show!

When you and your BFF’s team up, you always have so much fun! Whether you’re shopping for rockin’ outfits, preparing for the coolest fashion show, or getting your picture taken at a fashion magazine cover shoot, your girl friends are always there to make your day extra awesome!

Features:
> Be part of the coolest girl squad around! You'll love hanging out with your new BFF’s!
> Shop 'til you drop at the mall, and dress you and your squad up in awesome outfits! Score awesome prizes as you shop with your friends!
> From hip hop street style, to sporty chic or sparkly star, you've got so many looks to choose from!
> Have the time of your life at the FASHION SHOW!!! Choose from fab catwalk themes like movie premieres, spring break, and more!
> Strut your stuff down the runway and strike a pose, in the hottest trendy designer clothes!
> Will you win the runway contest? Impress the judges and vote for other girls!
> Get killer makeovers with your BFF’s! You'll rock your new makeup and hairstyle!
> Spa day with the girls! What could be more fun than a day at the spa with your best friends?!
> OMG! You've been invited to a cover shoot at Style Star Magazine! You guys will look great on the cover! Add adorably fun stickers to your photos!
> Get beautiful manicures with your friends! Every squad needs stylish nails!

comments: This is a very nice driving game. It's graphic and controls are incomparable to others. (Very & absolutely good). My 5 stars could have been voted for the apps after I had finished all the 60 levels therein until you have added the following features to it: 1. An automatic traffic indicator light switched-off. (I mean, indicator light to turn off by itself after a bend/junction had finished)  2. Rear view mirror to the car need to be fixed.  3. Let other vehicles in the game have all necessary indicator lights to make it real. 4. You have to put a stop to the vehicle that hit someone's car from the rear while stopping for traffic light or waiting at the junction to allow coming vehicle has its way.  5. Include pedestrian movement  and crossing in your next version to make it standard. All these to come-in in your next update to make it a perfect job please!

1.l don't like the word "out of the way" It is boring to start driving many times . You need to change it.  2.There is a place more little in this game.You should arrange many places or sights the player must enjoy to choose them.  3.Increasing some vehicles that is buses trucks vans compactcars.  4.Showing the acceleration on the screen.  5.Adding the headlight , the mirrorsides and the backwardmirror.  6.Showing the human in the car to be realistic.

It's so much interesting and challenging. However i made it to level 60. What a relief. For bad and inexperienced drivers......You are in for a big challenge/ trouble. It can be very annoying when u keep failing, but that is what i love about the game...  The challenge. Kudos to the person or persons behind it.

The graphics, game play, control are all excellent but I need to see more of bridges, rough roads or highway travelling in your new version. Thanks; you really keep me company. Note: include a rare view mirror, and I also need to be able to see my side while driving to avoid accident

description: ** School of Driving **Are you ready to be a city driver? Feel free to play any mode, Career, Checkpoint, Drift or Stunt mode. Earn points and get more car...Earn more points and personalize your car with rims and colors.HOW TO PLAY?- Career Mode -* Follow the yellow arrows* When there is direction arrow, use your signal before turning to get more Points* Dont run a red light* Dont crash* Drive on your way* Park your car to the green area- Checkpoint Mode -* Collect marks and turn back to the starting point in given time* Earn points as much as you collected marks- Drift Mode -* Drive fastly and drift in given time. GAME FEATURES- Realistic city traffic- Traffic rules like signal, traffic lights- Amazing and challenging missions- Realistic car sounds- 4 Control options, tilt, steering left or steering right and arrow keys- Different camera angles including Interior View !!- 7 different cars with 5 rims and 7 colours- 60 career levels
descriptionHTML:
** School of Driving **
Are you ready to be a city driver?
Feel free to play any mode, Career, Checkpoint, Drift or Stunt mode. Earn points and get more car...
Earn more points and personalize your car with rims and colors.


HOW TO PLAY?

- Career Mode -
* Follow the yellow arrows
* When there is direction arrow, use your signal before turning to get more Points
* Dont run a red light
* Dont crash
* Drive on your way
* Park your car to the green area

- Checkpoint Mode -
* Collect marks and turn back to the starting point in given time
* Earn points as much as you collected marks

- Drift Mode -
* Drive fastly and drift in given time.


GAME FEATURES
- Realistic city traffic
- Traffic rules like signal, traffic lights
- Amazing and challenging missions
- Realistic car sounds
- 4 Control options, tilt, steering left or steering right and arrow keys
- Different camera angles including Interior View !!
- 7 different cars with 5 rims and 7 colours
- 60 career levels
developerAddress: Yavuz sultan mah. Bezendi sokak no:26 Derince/Kocaeli
summary: ** School of Driving **
title: School of Driving

descriptionHTML:
What do you know about the Middle Ages?
What games inspire you?

The Middle Ages and the Renaissance are the brightest periods in the history of mankind. This era was referred to exclusively as "dark ages", where ignorance, inquisition and barbarism dominated. But it was also a time of romance, of great discoveries and fine works of art.

Create your own empire that will stand the test of time! Build medieval castles and develop medieval settlements.

Explore ruins, villages and look for architectural wonders. Build a unique settlement for your own project. Fight against other players from all over the world and shoulder to shoulder with them.

Discover new technologies:
- Explore new materials.
- Invent new weapons.
- Develop trade for the rapid growth of its economy.

Functions:
- Build and expand the kingdom with farms, careers and many others.
"Manage your property."
- Make a battle with other players in real time.
- Use a cross platform to always stay in the game and have more opportunities.

Requirements:
• Android 4.1 or higher.
• 1 GB of RAM is recommended.
• Internet connection.

Create your own kingdom. Conquer new territories to expand your kingdom and defeat the formidable rivals and other players in the epic battles.

The new improved 3D graphics will help you take full advantage of the graphics capabilities. Many aspects of the game are unique in this genre.

PLEASE NOTE:
Medieval Craft: My Exploration is a free game. Download and enjoy the unique features that are given to you. In addition, in accordance with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years old to play or download Medieval Craft: My Exploration.
summary: Create your own empire that will stand the test of time!
title: Medieval Craft: My Exploration

Play and explore different rooms in the house, and learn many new things with chubby and sweet baby panda Lu.Start your babysitting adventures and become the best panda nanny! Give panda Lu a shower in the rain or with an elephant. Prepare food and find out what she likes the most. Follow your virtual friend to the living room and do some fun housework. Don't forget to help your mummy at home too! When sleepy and tired, put baby panda Lu to bed and help her fall asleep after a long and wonderful day. description: Car drive parking is a simulation game and the master piece of kooker studio. You can see many games in the play store for example simulation racing parking shooting constructions and many more. The concept of all these games become dull and boring. Repetition of similar games make it boring. You will really experience a challenging game environment in this car drive parking. After playing this car driving games you can increase your parking skills in the car parking backyard. You will become expert car driver. Get an amazing experience of car drive parking and drift along the car drive simulation 3D. Show all your driving drifting and racing skills as a legend and real expert driver in this car drive parking. comments: Would be nice if there was a redo button for the last move. I'm very quick when playing and I often misplace a block. Also, why does the Apple version have stars and the android version doesn't? I was trying so hard to earn enough stars to buy the colour packs on my iPod, and I got quite disappointed that I can't do that on android. I guess I'll just delete the game off android since there's really no goal to the game now.

Very fun and addicting but nice calm relaxing game. Ads only happen after each round and not a big deal. If you want to keep playing this game FREE then add up with the package. Quiet whinning about ads. Someonbe has to pay the creators for this game including the upkeep and updates. How else will the creator make his money? 2 choices, either gets ads or charge to download. So I can deal with the ads. It's a FREE APP.

Really annoying when ads pop up and you have to start from scratch. That's really my only complaint about this game, but it's a big complaint. It sucks to feel like you get really far and then all of a sudden it stops in the middle of the game. This is a finished game not an interactive advertisement where it stops you from going further.  In all honestly it plays simply and I like it a lot but it needs some improvements.

I like the game a lot but it would be nice if there was a way to take back or redo your last move. There's been times that while I'm playing, the piece I'm placing ends up 1 square off from where I wanted it to go. Situations like that is where a "redo" or "do over" option would be very helpful and greatly appreciated. If you were to add that, it'd be a 5 star game for sure. Also some other colors options that didn't cost money would be great too! Other than those couple of things, keep up the great work you guys!

Kind of fun just trying to beat 1010. Played 5 times maybe and more than doubled the score that it says 1% get to..... not very fun after beating it. After the targets destroyed, what else do you aim for?

Way too many ads. I just need something for my fingers to do while listening to podcasts but this constantly interrupts my listening pretty much after every round. I really liked the game but I have had it with thw ads and am uninstalling. It's just not worth it.
