comments: Great game, but... This game had me hooked from the start but now the new PvP ranking system is kind of ruining it for me. Used to get great rewards the more you played during a season, but now (like others have mentioned) you have to be one of the top 100 players to earn any rewards worth while. I still dig the game, but it isn't nearly as addicting knowing that it will be years and tons of money toward gems until I am good enough to earn great rewards from PvP. If ever... I recommend checking it out, but until the new PvP changes I won't be playing nearly as often. Why fix something that isn't broken???

The new PVP mechanics is ruining the game. Gold is so hard to come by. I am level 12, and i can't upgrade gear or units. Use to be able to get gold from PVP battles but they took it away. I am also unable to play the game over WiFi anymore. It only connects over cellular data. Please fix this.
I would give it a higher rating if they fix the invisible troop and server connect error bugs.
NOT P2W!! and a good game in general. 5*

I typically don't post reviews, but I have to give this an honorable mention. It's a great game, fun gameplay, graphics are pretty good for a mobile game, the "gems" that you can buy with real money aren't a big issue like other games, they don't post ads every 5 seconds telling you to buy them and there's not really a need to, I don't buy gems on mobile games but I do with this one to support it, it's a great strategy game for mobile devices with different units all with their different strengths and weaknesses, you can upgrade their gear, promote them, and give them traits to improve them. It keeps me coming back and the gameplay isn't stale, it keeps me entertained. I find myself playing this instead of my Xbox one at times. A must have game in my opinion.

Please don't tell me I have to start from the beginning?!?! Before transferring all my data to a new phone, I successfully checked that I wouldn't lose progress, but I have 😔 Is there a way to restore the game back to where I was at? I was quite high up. If so, definitely will give 5 stars
description: EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?JOIN THE FIGHTTake on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battlesYOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORYMake the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefieldUNITE THE LANDBuild your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliancesEQUIP YOUR TROOPSDiscover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilitiesDEFEND YOUR HOMEMarch through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of DunmarDESTROY YOUR ENEMIESHoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboardsWarlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.Are you ready to join the fight?
descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?
recentChanges: A new ranking system will now reward PvP victories with War Coins. These can be traded in for regiment shards at War Harbor.
You will now get a push notification when your units are back from an expedition.
- Some players were not able to sync their accounts via Google Play or Game Center. This has been resolved.
- A rare case in which a spawned unit, such as a Tree of Corruption, would break the battle when taking damage has been fixed.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

description: Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
developerAddress: Suite 603, 6/F, Laws Commercial Plaze, 788 Cheung Sha Wan Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong
recentChanges: -Optimized the system frame for a better stability and game experience.
summary: Brand New Strategy Game, Battle to Win the Showdown with AI Robots and Zombies
title: Art of War : Last Day

description: Do you have small kids at home who like Princess Sofia? Does your little girl love kitchen or Ice Cream Maker games? Then you must download “princess sofia - Cooking Games for Girls”, one of the best ice cream and food maker games available on Google Play. With some cool and funky graphics, and attractive animations, this kid cooking game is specially designed for little girls and boys. Kids will learn to make ice cream, sweet donuts, cotton candy, burger and yummy milkshakes in a fun way. This snow cone game lets the players become an expert of food maker and take their cooking fever to a whole new level.How to Play:Just carefully follow the step by step voice tutorial in the game and make tasty snack, burger and donut cookies and Show your skills as the kitchen master and raise the cooking level with “Princess Sofia - Cooking Games for Girls”. comments: More or less meh, can do with or without. For this edit I've lowered my rating since after update. Sure clan stuff looks nicer and I was excited about the infinite scouts for videos, however that perk is gone. Really makes me lose interest since I'm not gonna pay to play. Not to mention it also recently got way more difficult to get gems and overall this game is getting pathetic.

Love the game. The game play is great. Only down side is that I feel that the game cheats against me sometimes by adding enemies. Only happened about 3 times now. ***edit*** I have since realized there are certain pigs that do add more pigs when hit. The game doesn't cheat. I'm extremely happy with the game play and ability to build a great team without paying a whole bunch of money. You just need patients and good planning.

Personally I don't like PvP system in this game. You don't play with other players in real time so I even don't know how it can be called PvP. Additionally system put you with a player which has much more power than you, so there is no chance to win. Time wasting.

the game is really fun and humorous. I love the clan feature- found a great clan to be part of. there are glitches that rovio needs to iron out that affect play. I am hoping this new big update helps fix all that. the changes look to be really good. excited to see what they've done.

I did not expect to enjoy this nearly as much as I have. The frequent events are nice and having a guild just makes them better. I don't feel compelled to be social be because there is no chat, just playing the game. It is a wonderful balance.

Only had the game a few days. Was going great till the update today and like many i hit the fetching player profile and it has a server error and cannot connect. Glad i haven't spent months on this game like others for this to happen. Hope the problem is resolved soon. It had become and addicting game.
description: Collect, assemble, and evolve your flock.100+ crazy new Angry Birds?! We’re gonna need a bigger nest. The flock is bigger and badder than ever before. Build your own team, combine super skills and evolve your birds into their ultimate form.Embark on an epic adventure.Something sinister is brewing on Bird Island. Why are there so many pigs around? Who is behind the mysterious Bacon Corp? What’s the Eagle Force? Who lost the dungeon keys? Find the answers – only in Angry Birds Evolution.Crush the pigs in explosive battles.What’s worse than egg-stealing pigs? Over 90 different varieties of egg-stealing Pigs, that's what. Pirates, ninjas, tourists – someone has to clean this place up. Let the feathers fly in full contact battles and send the pigs packing.Join weekly events.Earn awesome rewards, and get a chance to add extra rare birds to your team by taking part in weekly events. Join by yourself or assemble a clan of buddies to compete with other clans. Build the strongest, most awesome clan on Bird Island and rule the roost! Compete against other players.The Oinktagon: two teams enter – only one leaves (victorious). Challenge other players in PVP tournaments of the Bird Island pastime, Pigball, and dominate the leagues for even more awesome rewards.FEATURES:– Over 100 colorful new characters to hatch and collect.– Assemble the ultimate flock of birds and take down the pigs with ease.– 5 Classes of birds with unique abilities.– Evolve your feathery heroes into unstoppable super birds.– Explore the island and stop the Bacon Corp.– Climb up the Eagle Mountain and win ultimate eggs.– Battle other players in the Oinktagon.– Join clans to unlock perks, compete with other clans, and chat with clanmates.– Send out scouts for rewards & challenges.This game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

comments: Game is fun but just as others say it takes forever to get through a round due to big pauses between questions. The ability to write in your own question sounds interesting but I don't think it really adds much in the end. The game is worthwhile when it's on sale but don't pay full price for it.
Just stuck saying waiting for other players when me and my son are both connected and there isn't any other players. Won't start because it's saying that

This game is the best family interactive game I have ever had the pleasure to play   The developers should design more like this ie catchphrase , family fortunes etc  Fantastic game play  We have many nights of good fun   Can't understand the poor reviews they obviously haven't got a clue how to use or play the game   A decent Wi-Fi connection from the router is required don't blame the game   It last an average of 40 minutes a game which is good going   Extremely happy please develope more quiz games like this
This is such an awesome game for the family and friends testing you to see who knows more about random stuff. I recommend it 10/10
Won't connect to the ps4 while on the same wifi even when I enter the ps4's ip address. Forced me to use my ps4 as a hotspot for no reason.
It's trash
description: Knowledge is Power is the companion app you need to play the quiz game full of trivia, tricks and tactics for the PlayStation®4 system.Challenge your friends and family to a battle of brainpower in this competitive quiz for two to six players.Use your phone or tablet to answer rapid fire general knowledge questions, compete in touch screen challenges and target your rivals with an arsenal of Power Plays.Make sure your PS4™ system is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.Use this app to:Choose a character and snap a selfie using fun filters that match the lookAnswer quiz questions without your rivals seeing your choiceChoose from a selection of Power Plays and target your closest rivalsEngage in touch screen challenges to be the faster finger on the sofaPlay 'Quick Quiz' using just the app and share your winner’s photo on social mediaThe application can be used in the following languages:English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Russian, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Turkish, Greek, Czech and Hungarian.PlayLink titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™ system, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. http://playstation.com/playlinkforps4Please note: This app acts as a controller. PS4™ system, the Knowledge is Power game, and the Knowledge is Power Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and the Knowledge is Power game for the PS4™ system sold separately.The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use if this app, depending on your country of residence:https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-use/op/
descriptionHTML:
Knowledge is Power is the companion app you need to play the quiz game full of trivia, tricks and tactics for the PlayStation®4 system.

Challenge your friends and family to a battle of brainpower in this competitive quiz for two to six players.
Use your phone or tablet to answer rapid fire general knowledge questions, compete in touch screen challenges and target your rivals with an arsenal of Power Plays.

Make sure your PS4™ system is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
Choose a character and snap a selfie using fun filters that match the look
Answer quiz questions without your rivals seeing your choice
Choose from a selection of Power Plays and target your closest rivals
Engage in touch screen challenges to be the faster finger on the sofa
Play 'Quick Quiz' using just the app and share your winner’s photo on social media

The application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Danish, Norwegian, Finnish, Russian, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Turkish, Greek, Czech and Hungarian.

PlayLink titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™ system, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. http://playstation.com/playlinkforps4

Please note: This app acts as a controller. PS4™ system, the Knowledge is Power game, and the Knowledge is Power Companion App required to play. PS4™ system and the Knowledge is Power game for the PS4™ system sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use if this app, depending on your country of residence:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-use/op/

comments: It's impossible to progress in league because of pay to win characters. Was fun at first but I literally can't progress because everyone I play against has all legendary and epic cards that I can't compete with. I can't level up my cards without going up in league so I literally can't play anymore.

Not worth investing money into.  There is no continued playability.  It's a very fun game.  HOWEVER, the game is so limited that there is literally nothing to do and no reason to play after 30 minutes of playing.  The rewards dry up.  Journey passes are gone, used up in minutes....and the package/gem offerings for money are so miserly that it's like throwing your money down the toilet.  Speaking of toilets, this game is a great game if your sitting on one.  By the time you flush, the activities are done.

Great game,  bit miffed that it keeps crashing in middle of battles and I lose through no fault of my own. Especially on journey as there are limited trys and it takes too long to get more. Please fix and I will gladly improve to a 5 star rating.  Update:  It is getting worse with reliability, can barely get 3 minutes before crashing.  Not enough time to complete any battles. Fix soon or I will be leaving forever, and I am sure others will do the same.

I first play this game when it came out on Kongregate way way way back when. It was good then and it's great now. Thanks to the development team for putting out a favorite classic from my formative Kongregate years and for not letting it die. You guys rock!!!!

This game has some serious issues, the way connection imperfections are managed is terrible, you play against other players, and the tiniest low in connection will make you disconnect, resulting in a lost (even if on client side you actually finished the fight and won, even if you didn't even need to play to win a fight, if your connection isn't 100%, you lose as a way of punishing you or something).  Worst of all, if you think about complaining to them, the support form doesn't work, even typing is slow in the form, and you can never send it.  Conclusion: this game has a nice exterior, with a very bad structure inside.

I love it on Kongregate. I hate it as an mobile app as it's buggy as hell. Right now app freezes on "Friends" tab. Apart from that you can open hero chests only one by one, which forces you either to spend crystals to speed up the process or wait 2 - 8 hours which slows down your progress. Comparing to Kongregate version where all chests count down timers work at the same time, and you can enjoy opening 4 chests at the same speed.
description: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces! Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!Features:● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes. ● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!Note: Mighty Party: Heroes  Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is required.Support:Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.Visit  our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
descriptionHTML:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is a turn-based tactical card battle RPG.

Brave Hero, fight in fast 3-minute dynamic PvP battles! Summon dozens of epic war heroes to defeat all the opponents in the turn-based battle arena! Prove your guild alliance is the strongest one in the fantasy world of Mighty Party: Heroes Clash!

Play the troops of Imperial Archers, defend them with Wind Ninja, strengthen them with Magic of Divinity and destroy opponents forces!
Get ready to clash your Mighty Party on!

Features:
● Turn-based & fast-paced innovative battle system. Real strategy and tactics!
● Infinite battle combinations from dozens of war heroes.
● Epic Warlords with unique battle skills.
● Captivating PVP (Ranked Battles, Brawl, Arena matches, Tournaments, Survival, Raids, Events etc.) with great epic rewards!
● Single player campaign with an epic story of through the realm. A true hero’s Journey!
● Turf Wars is a game mode where your guild alliance fights using their troops against opponents for the most valuable territories. Prepare the Guild for glory!
● Lots of ways to evolve mighty heroes: level-up them, bind them with others, turn them into Legendary ones, upgrade skills in Turf Wars!

Defeat others in online PvP -> Receive Magical and Legendary Chests -> Recruit and Evolve new battle Heroes -> Gather your MIGHTY PARTY -> Clash with other players in PVP -> Join the strongest Guild Alliance -> Be no. 1!
Assemble your forces and lead your Mighty Party to victory!

Note:
Mighty Party: Heroes Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

A network connection is required.

Support:
Are you having problems? Please contact us via e-mail mightyparty.panoramik@gmail.com or in-game by going to Settings > Support.

Visit our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/mightyparty.game
recentChanges: "Tiny Parties" are available now! These are small short-time events. For example, all buildings get skill "Death: deals 10 DMG to enemy warlord" or all "Titanias" get double HP.
Create a deck that will rule the ladder!
A lot of small fixes and improvements
summary: Epic Warlords & strategic PvP fights returns in fast turn-based RPG Mighty Party
title: Mighty Party: Heroes Clash

comments: I absolutely love this game! As a person who enjoys strategy games, from RTS such as Stronghold, Supreme Commander, and C&C, this game takes my top 3 for the phone. The match making system is very good at keeping same skilled players together, as well as it isn't very much a pay to win game. The units are decently balanced and the game isn't to slow or fast. Definitely a game I will keep playing for a long time. I do want to ask, if you guys will be putting in a "survival mode", and withstand against waves of enemies. Great job FourThirtyThree

The game is okay it has a lot of faults. The matching system is horrible it always puts me against people that are hundreds of levels higher than me. And somehow their money regenerate quicker and they're able to send  out more and bigger and better units out on the battlefield. Even when the matchmaking system puts me against somebody my own level their money regenerates quicker than mine and they send out a lot more units faster than I can for whatever reason. Uninstalling this game

I'll update whenever I can actually play the game. It's up to date. I get to the screen that asks if I'd like to use my Google account or Facebook account. I do not have a Facebook. Obviously I have a Google account. I'm writing this review. I click Google and both options disappear. It sets at that screen where the two options were previously available and nothing happens. I made sure to wait around 5 mins to see if it was a loading issue.. dunno. I'd love to try out the game.

really good game i love it but just some ideas that might make it even better (I think the menu on the left side could have a higher contrast (text and background)or I think the trophy chest amount could be adjusted to the player amount in the clan +to participate in trophy chest you have to be in the clan since it started (midnight)please do some balance changes soon... some untis don't feel to be used enough or some just are OP like the steel saw mech or another idea :to have some way to delete (locked) chests )please reply if you (4:33)see it and want to give a statement

Its a good game, i like this kind of games and i love when i play with friends too! The game its really easy to play, a strategy game and simply as destroy the enemy base... Love it! Its true that not all are going to like this but for me this game its 5 stars. Btw i have started the game and i said i love to play with friends, does this game has a Couple/Duo match to play with them (Not versus them). Thanks in advice, keep staying great!!

Edit: dev clearly cares about reviews and responds to feedback.  Upped rating just for that, nice to see.  Its still pay to win at a certain point, but you can get about halfway, maybe a bit more, up the ranks before you run into that in a less than enjoyable way.  I cant play on a less than perfect connection, but dev says its a constant work, and that seems consistent with basically every other arena style game.  Thank you for the feedback, it really is appreciated.
description: Enemies up ahead Commander! Plan out your strategy and the use of Battle Point to outstrip your opponents with your troops in the extended battlefields!Go all out BOOM with the newest RTS type mobile game! Be the commander to your always ready for action troops and epic units and lead them to glory! Take control of the battle and be ready to bring on the BOOM with over 70 different types of units. Whether it is swarming the opponent with infantry troops, blasting your way through enemy defenses with tanks or surprising the enemy with exploding rats! Do whatever it takes to be the one with the best strategy and to emerge victorious! Battle it out and become the most feared commander and expert strategist.FEATURES-   Global real-time strategy battle!-   Enjoy the vast and panoramic battlefield and adapt your strategy.-   Bring on the BOOM with over 70+ units and weapons at your disposal!-   Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!-   Enjoy the face melting graphics!-   Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!Find more information about Battle Boom on:Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/battleboomglobal/YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbcdQ5PdY1gI0mm3jdki6cQp>* App permission guide* Android 6.0 and up requires access permission for playing the game. -External Storage (Read/Write)Device, photos, media, files accessThis permission is required for installing the game on the external storage. This permission allows you to install games in external memory in case of insufficient memory.We do not access your photos , media, and files.

- Join forces with your Legion members and battle your way to the top of the world!
- Enjoy the face melting graphics!
- Limitless strategy to blow up your enemies with the use of tanks or unit-producing buildings.
*Disclaimer: BOOM is not an addiction, it’s a necessity!
